item.title: Genomic imprinting (0.5cp)
item.description: Reviewed articles Genomic imprinting in mammals. Denise P. Barlow et al 2014, Cold Spring Harbor Perspectives in Biology, 20pp Genomic imprinting and parent-of-origin effects on complex traits. Heather A. Lawson et al. 2013, Nature Reviews Genetis, (10pp) Genomic imprinting: the emergence of an epigenetic paradigm.Anne C. Ferguson-Smith, 2011 (12pp) write more.
